Package document

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExtendedTextStatistics
    Interface to record the methods requested by a user when pressing "Show statistics" button in the GUI.
    MainTextStatistics
    Interface to record the methods with output displayed in the main view of the GUI.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDocument
    Represents a text document: string content of the file and its properties: words, frequencies.
    Essay
    Represents a document of a type Essay, a student's written work Extends AbstractDocument
    FileContent
    A class for getting the string content of the text file; will be updated with the methods treating various formats of the file
    GrammarEvaluation
    Represents grammar properties of the text and instruments to get them Handles the following features: - comparative and superlative adjectives; - comparative and superlative adverbs; - modal verbs; - mumber of imperative forms; - existential; - Present Simple Active; - Present Perfect Active; - Present Continuous Active; - Past Simple Active; - Past Perfect Active; - Past Continuous Active; - Present Perfect Continuous; - Future Simple Active; - Future Perfect Active; - Future Continuous;
    PosTagger
    The class implements Stanford Maximum Entropy POStagger and represents lexical properties of the document
    ReadingMaterial
    Class represents a text used for reading exercises as opposed to students' written work Extends AbstractDocument.
    Tokenizer
    A helper class used for tokenization of text files
